sources.title: Alice's Adventures In Wonderland
sources.description: Alice falls down a rabbit hole and into a magical dream world populated by surreal characters and bewildering adventures.Â

metadata.Plot: Alice (Fiona Fullerton) falls down a rabbit hole and into a magical dream world populated by surreal characters and bewildering adventures. It's a journey of self-discovery for Alice as she searches for a way out of Wonderland and encounters many bizarre creatures such as the White Rabbit (Michael Crawford), the March Hare (Peter Sellers), the Queen of Hearts (Dame Flora Robson), and the Dormouse (Dudley Moore). Musical highlights include the inspiring song "The Me I Never Knew".
metadata.Actors: Fiona Fullerton, Michael Jayston, Hywel Bennett
